roadmapItems.title: Release 1.0.0
roadmapItems.description: Initial release with major feature expansions and bug fixes.

children.title: Template Expansion
children.description: Expanding the template library with new and improved options.

children.title: Resolved issues with template loading times.
children.description: Fixed loading time issues for templates to ensure faster access.

children.title: Added 10 new responsive templates to the template library.
children.description: Introduced 10 new responsive templates to enhance user design options.

children.title: SEO Booster
children.description: Enhancing SEO capabilities to improve website visibility.

children.title: Fixed meta tag generation errors.
children.description: Corrected errors in the generation of meta tags for better SEO.

children.title: Improved keyword analysis tool for better SEO suggestions.
children.description: Enhanced the keyword analysis tool to provide better SEO suggestions.

children.title: E-commerce Integration
children.description: Integrating advanced e-commerce features for better functionality.

children.title: Corrected checkout process glitches.
children.description: Fixed glitches in the checkout process to ensure smooth transactions.

children.title: Added support for multiple payment gateways.
children.description: Introduced support for multiple payment gateways to expand e-commerce options.

roadmapItems.title: Release 1.2.0
roadmapItems.description: Release focused on template customization and performance optimization.

children.title: Template Customizer
children.description: New customization options for templates to enhance user control.

children.title: Addressed bugs in the drag-and-drop editor.
children.description: Fixed bugs in the drag-and-drop editor to improve functionality.

children.title: Introduced new customization options for templates.
children.description: Added new options to customize templates more effectively.

children.title: Performance Optimization
children.description: Optimizing performance for high-traffic websites.

children.title: Fixed slow loading times for high-traffic websites.
children.description: Resolved issues causing slow loading times on busy websites.

children.title: Enhanced website speed and performance with new caching mechanisms.
children.description: Improved site speed with advanced caching techniques for better performance.

roadmapItems.title: Release 2.0.0
roadmapItems.description: Major update introducing mobile optimization and advanced analytics.

children.title: Mobile Optimization
children.description: Optimizing site layouts and performance for mobile devices.

children.title: Resolved layout issues on mobile devices.
children.description: Fixed layout problems affecting mobile device users.

children.title: Introduced mobile-specific design options and optimizations.
children.description: Added design options and optimizations specifically for mobile use.

children.title: Advanced Analytics
children.description: Providing detailed insights into website traffic and user behavior.

children.title: Fixed data discrepancies in analytics reports.
children.description: Corrected issues causing inaccuracies in analytics reports.

children.title: Added detailed traffic analysis and user behavior tracking.
children.description: Introduced advanced features for analyzing traffic and tracking user behavior.

children.title: User Management
children.description: Enhanced management and permissions for website users.

children.title: Corrected issues with user role assignments.
children.description: Fixed problems related to assigning roles to users.

children.title: Implemented advanced user role management and permissions.
children.description: Added advanced features for managing user roles and permissions.

roadmapItems.title: Release 2.3.0
roadmapItems.description: Focused release on multilingual support and SEO enhancements.

children.title: Multilingual Support
children.description: Supporting multiple languages to reach a global audience.

children.title: Fixed language selection issues.
children.description: Resolved problems users faced when selecting languages.

children.title: Added support for 10 new languages.
children.description: Introduced support for 10 additional languages to the platform.

children.title: SEO Enhancements
children.description: Improving SEO tools to enhance website visibility and performance.

children.title: Corrected sitemap generation errors.
children.description: Fixed issues in generating accurate sitemaps for better SEO.

children.title: Improved backlink analysis tool for better SEO tracking.
children.description: Enhanced the backlink analysis tool to provide more accurate SEO tracking.

roadmapItems.title: Release 3.0.0
roadmapItems.description: Major release featuring AI content generation and enhanced security.

children.title: AI Content Generator
children.description: Introducing an AI-powered tool for generating high-quality website content.

children.title: Resolved issues with content formatting.
children.description: Fixed formatting issues in AI-generated content.

children.title: Introduced an AI-powered tool for generating website content.
children.description: Added an AI tool to help users create engaging website content.

children.title: Enhanced Security
children.description: Implementing advanced security features to protect user data.

children.title: Fixed vulnerabilities in user authentication.
children.description: Resolved security issues found in user authentication processes.

children.title: Added two-factor authentication and advanced security features.
children.description: Introduced two-factor authentication and other security improvements.

children.title: Custom Widgets
children.description: Enhancing functionality with customizable widgets.

children.title: Addressed bugs in widget integration.
children.description: Fixed bugs affecting the integration of widgets.

children.title: Introduced customizable widgets for various functionalities.
children.description: Added new customizable widgets to enhance website functionality.

roadmapItems.title: Release 3.2.0
roadmapItems.description: Focused on e-commerce analytics, template marketplace, and site migration.

children.title: E-commerce Analytics
children.description: Providing detailed analytics for e-commerce performance tracking.

children.title: Resolved issues with sales data tracking.
children.description: Fixed bugs that were causing inaccuracies in sales data tracking.

children.title: Added detailed sales and customer behavior analytics.
children.description: Introduced detailed analytics for better understanding of sales and customer behavior.

children.title: Template Marketplace
children.description: Launching a marketplace for third-party templates and plugins.

children.title: Fixed bugs in template purchase process.
children.description: Resolved issues affecting the purchase of templates from the marketplace.

children.title: Launched a marketplace for third-party templates and plugins.
children.description: Introduced a new marketplace for third-party templates and plugins.

children.title: Site Migration Tool
children.description: Introducing an easy-to-use tool for migrating websites from other platforms.

children.title: Corrected errors in the site migration process.
children.description: Fixed issues causing errors during the site migration process.

children.title: Introduced an easy-to-use tool for migrating websites from other platforms.
children.description: Added a tool to simplify the process of migrating sites from other platforms.
